activities.name: Update schema name
activities.description: updated schema from dbo do dbs because for some reason I cannot use the dbo in AzureSQL

scripts.text: update   [edw].[RistETLConfig]  set srcSchema = 'dbs' where destSchema in ('rist', 'aux', 'edw')

scriptLines: SelectFilteredJoinedColumns split(indicator == 'Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k' || indicator == 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k',
pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),
